english.segment1: Im not the clothes Im wearing. Im not a photograph. Im not the car I drive
english.segment2: Im not the money I make. Im not the things I lack. Im not the songs that I write
english.segment3: I am who I am. I am who I am
english.segment4: There are true things inside of me. I have been afraid to see. I believe, help my unbelief. Would you say again what you said to me. I am loved and I am free. I believe, help my unbelief
english.segment5: Im not the house I live in. Im not the man I love. Im not the mistakes that I carry
english.segment6: Im not the food that I dont eat. Im not what Im above. Im not my scars and my history
english.segment7: There are true things inside of me. I have been afraid to see. I believe, help my unbelief. Would you say again what you said to me. I am loved and I am free. I believe, help my unbelief
english.segment8: To your love Im waking up. In your love Im waking up.
